name: Endless Corridor (JoyGameZ)
description:
Endless Corridor is a endless runner game I made in 5 days.

Includes 3 power ups, Magnet, Hourglass and PowerPak each having an ability.

Game is procedurally generated, being the obstacles are always randomized along with rng chance of powerups,  Also 3 types of floor and wall textures. The game gets progressively harder as you accumulate crystals.

The background music in game have 5 random music tracks that play, all music and sound effects are from freesound.org

The save feature saves your distance ran and crystals collected only if your old score was beaten. When old score is beaten, text will appear indicating you beat your old score, the  highscore bests are shown on the title screen in upper left hand corner.
